title: Fix #11, replace single quote characters and fix Indian Head Cents
message:
Fix #11, replace single quote characters and fix Indian Head Cents

Fixes the two issues that were causing crashes after the last
release.

title: Fix #10, make CSV exporting more robust
message:
Fix #10, make CSV exporting more robust

We now use opencsv to read and write the CSV files, which
is much more robust than our old implementation

title: Refactor and cleanup (minor)
message:
Refactor and cleanup (minor)

Moving the two DISPLAY values out of MainApplication and into
the core code

title: Make the coin mint / option API more generic
message:
Make the coin mint / option API more generic

Making the mint mark / option checkbox part of the
CollectionInfo more generic so that it can be used more
widely.  Now collections register for generic checkboxes
(specifying the associated text for the user) and get
the result back when creating a collection.

title: Refactor to move the core app code into its own package
message:
Refactor to move the core app code into its own package

Just discovered Android Libraries!  In prep for moving the
core code into one of those, moving the associated files
into a new package.

title: Refactor by seperating out the core app code
message:
Refactor by seperating out the core app code

Modifying the directory structure to eventually mirror how
the repo will be structured - the core code contained in one
standalone package, and the app-specific code outside of it.
The next steps are to move the resource files into here as
well (unfortunately I can't think of a good way to keep them
while moving to this model) along with the strings.

title: Add database upgrade method to the CollectionInfo API
message:
Add database upgrade method to the CollectionInfo API

Adding onCollectionDatabaseUpgrade to the CollectionInfo API and
moving the existing db upgrade code into the respective classes.
Also, adding an upgrade method in MainApplication which is
called before the coin-specific methods so that db changes which
are required for the app to function properly are applied first.

title: Incorporates the per-coin attributions into the info text
message:
Incorporates the per-coin attributions into the info text

The attribution section of the app info section is now generated
from the getAttributionString API call

title: Add collection image attribution information
message:
Add collection image attribution information

Adding in image attribution into the CollectionInfo API,
and updated all the existing collections with this info.
Replacing coin images just to ensure the attribution is
correct.  I still need to add code that calls this
method and aggregates the information for displaying on
the info page.

Fixing a bug sw23 identified in the logic to detect
whether no mint marks have been selected when creating
a new collection.

title: Document the CollectionInfo API and minor cleanup
message:
Document the CollectionInfo API and minor cleanup

Adding documentation about the CollectionInfo API, making
most of the coin mints not include a space, and refactoring
a bit to make things more intuitive

title: Decouple coin-specific logic from the main code
message:
Decouple coin-specific logic from the main code

Creating a class for each collection type and moving most of
the coin-specific code into there.  This should make it much
easier to add new collections and or extend the app to work
with other coin types.  Also fixing up some white space, and
a few other minor fixes.

title: Fixed an issue to where the logic for adding in the 2017 coins could result in…
message: Fixed an issue to where the logic for adding in the 2017 coins could result in the 'D' coin getting added before the 'P' coin (which is opposite of our normal convention)

title: Adding in new images for the kennedy half obverse and lincoln cent obverse
message: Adding in new images for the kennedy half obverse and lincoln cent obverse

title: - Updating the app with the 2017 coin releases
message:
- Updating the app with the 2017 coin releases
 - Adding in a python gimp script that automates the process of taking the source image files and doing the processing necessary to get them into the app standard format
 - Replacing a lot of the coin images with more standard file names, and with versions processed automatically by the gimp script.  There's still some work left to do in converting the older images over to using the new naming convention. TODO
